page.title: 18A DAY IN THE LIFE OF POLLY
page.content:
IN THE MORNING I GET UP AT ABOUT 7 O'CLOCK. THEN I GO AND SEE MY MUM. THEN I HAVE BREAKFAST OF CORNFLAKES. I WALK WITH MY MUM TO SCHOOL. THE BELL GOES AT 9 O'CLOCK AND WE READ. AT PLAY TIME I GO AND PLAY CATCH WITH FRIENDS OUTSIDE UNTIL THE BELL GOES. AFTER PLAY WE DO SOME WRITING IN OUR BOOKS.THEN WE HAVE PLAY TIME AGAIN AND HAVE LUNCH.
THE BELL GOES AT 1.30 AND WE WORK IN OUR MATHS BOOKS OR ROUGHBOOKS. WE HAVE OUR LAST PLAY TIME AT 2.30. THEN EVERYONE GOES INSIDE AT 2.45 AND WORKS UNTIL 3.3O WHEN IT IS HOME TIME. AT HOME I WATCH TV OR GO UP STAIRS AND PLAY UNTIL SUPPER. AFTER SUPPER I WATCH A BIT OF TV BUT AT 9.OO I HAVE TO GO TO BED. SO DOES REBECCA MY SISTER.
